amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent the bill from applying to businesses that have been cited for violating labor laws in the past year against employees who are veterans of the Armed Forces.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-291 to prevent this Act from applying to businesses that have been cited for violating labor laws in the past year against employees who are veterans of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walz (MN) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 221 (Roll no. 866).
